author: cryptoblockchaintechnologies
content: It takes roughly 4 solar panels per GPU to mine 24x7. You think small and assume renewable miners don't understand how to scale a mining systems to be self sufficient. It might be surprising to you but utility companies love renewable solar miners as we feed huge amounts of energy into the grid during daylight hours where energy demand is higher (and in some cases they charge higher fees). At night we take that energy back when people are sleeping and overall demand is lower.  We have been doing this for years, just because you and the POS media choose to only listen to uniformed sources does not strengthen your case and only makes you part of the problem of those jumping on board the latest POW cancel culture with unfounded claims.

>>> :flag-cn: We are a fast growing cryptocurrency exchange, which
recently entered the European market. Our exchanger has been in
existence for over 2 years and is known in the expanses of China . To
attract new users, we did a free giveaway with 200 prizes worth almost
958 ETH.

üìå The investor has entered into an agreement with discord to
allow the use of discord as a platform for the distribution of P2P

works strictly under the contract in accordance with the law! 

[...]

üéÅ You won 13.157 ETH üéÅ

author: sky.cactus
content: Anyone who cold DMs you something is probably a scammer.

author: sky.cactus
content: Also, please delete the message above so readers of this server aren't further scammed.

author: ann_kane
